prompt: A common yet enchanting celestial artifact. The Stardust Compass is a small, ancient brass device with a shimmering blue glass center that glows faintly with cosmic light. It is adorned with tiny, star-like carvings and symbols. Surrounding the compass are swirling, wispy trails of cosmic dust and tiny constellations. The background features a vibrant nebula with stars twinkling gently, adding to the mystical charm of the artifact. The art style is bright and ethereal with a focus on the cosmic elements.
